name: JohnFordPodcastTheEveningRancor
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Evening Rancor. The pontification, ramblings and propaganda from an old school radio guy now dabbling into the tepid waters of podcasting. Former host of talk and radio shows on ABC Radio, WSHE, WIOD, WZTA, KDGE, WLLZ and other 4 letter words. Now podcasting from his home studio in Austin.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
